item.description: Phantazee points Top 20 per position (QB, WR, RB) Top 20 scorers within position (QB, RB, WR only) were taken from 2020 weekly points scored. Phantazee scoring rulez were then applied 1. Smoothed averages by position (top 20 per week): Figure 1: Smoothed loess estimates. Figure 2: Boxplot estimates show variability within groups of top 20s. Individual performances (top 20 per position):
